meaningMnemonic: <kanji>Untie</kanji> and <kanji>scatter</kanji> everything. This will cause the <vocabulary>dissolution</vocabulary> the <vocabulary>breakup</vocabulary>, and indeed the <vocabulary>breaking up</vocabulary> of whatever is being untied then scattered.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
